MS.S: DSC resources for managing certificates on a Windows Server.
Copyright the DSC Community contributors. All rights reserved.

## [5.0.0] - 2020-10-16_x000A__x000D__x000A_### Changed_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Corrected incorrectly located entries in `CHANGELOG.MD`._x000D__x000A_- Fix bug `Find-Certificate` when invalid certificate path is passed - fixes_x000D__x000A_ [Issue #208](https://github.com/dsccommunity/CertificateDsc/issues/208)._x000D__x000A_- CertReq:_x000D__x000A_ - Added `Get-CertificateCommonName` function as a fix for multiple_x000D__x000A_ certificates being issued when having a third party CA which doesn't_x000D__x000A_ format the Issuer CN in the same order as a MS CA - fixes [Issue #207](https://github.com/dsccommunity/CertificateDsc/issues/207)._x000D__x000A_ - Updated `Compare-CertificateIssuer` to use the new_x000D__x000A_ `Get-CertificateCommonName` function._x000D__x000A_ - Added check for X500 subject name in Get-TargetResource, which already_x000D__x000A_ exists in Test- and Set-TargetResource - fixes [Issue #210](https://github.com/dsccommunity/CertificateDsc/issues/210)._x000D__x000A_ - Corrected name of working path to remove `x` - fixes [Issue #211](https://github.com/dsccommunity/CertificateDsc/issues/211)._x000D__x000A_- BREAKING CHANGE: Changed resource prefix from MSFT to DSC._x000D__x000A_- Updated to use continuous delivery pattern using Azure DevOps - Fixes_x000D__x000A_ [Issue #215](https://github.com/dsccommunity/CertificateDsc/issues/215)._x000D__x000A_- Updated Examples and Module Manifest to be DSC Community from Microsoft._x000D__x000A_- Fix style issues in `Certificate.PDT` and `Certificate.Common` modules._x000D__x000A_- Update badges in README.MD to refer to correct pipeline._x000D__x000A_- Correct version number in `GitVersion.yml` file._x000D__x000A_- Change Azure DevOps Pipeline definition to include `source/*` - Fixes [Issue #226](https://github.com/dsccommunity/CertificateDsc/issues/226)._x000D__x000A_- Updated pipeline to use `latest` version of `ModuleBuilder` - Fixes [Issue #226](https://github.com/dsccommunity/CertificateDsc/issues/226)._x000D__x000A_- Merge `HISTORIC_CHANGELOG.md` into `CHANGELOG.md` - Fixes [Issue #227](https://github.com/dsccommunity/CertificateDsc/issues/227)._x000D__x000A_- Fixed build failures caused by changes in `ModuleBuilder` module v1.7.0_x000D__x000A_ by changing `CopyDirectories` to `CopyPaths` - Fixes [Issue #230](https://github.com/dsccommunity/CertificateDsc/issues/230)._x000D__x000A_- Updated to use the common module _DscResource.Common_ - Fixes [Issue #229](https://github.com/dsccommunity/CertificateDsc/issues/229)._x000D__x000A_- Pin `Pester` module to 4.10.1 because Pester 5.0 is missing code_x000D__x000A_ coverage - Fixes [Issue #233](https://github.com/dsccommunity/CertificateDsc/issues/233)._x000D__x000A_- Added a catch for certreq generic errors which fixes [Issue #224](https://github.com/dsccommunity/CertificateDsc/issues/224)_x000D__x000A_- CertificateDsc_x000D__x000A_ - Automatically publish documentation to GitHub Wiki - Fixes [Issue #235](https://github.com/dsccommunity/CertificateDsc/issues/235)._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Added_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- PfxImport:_x000D__x000A_ - Added example showing importing private key using `PsDscRunAsCredential`_x000D__x000A_ to specify an administrator account - Fixes [Issue #213](https://github.com/dsccommunity/CertificateDsc/issues/213).
